name: European Rail Freight Association
goal: ERFA's main objective is to improve the competitive environment for rail freight across Europe. We seek to improve the quality of rail service, reduce costs of rail and remove any remaining access barriers.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Digital economy and society, Environment, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: ERFA is following developments on the Rail Freight Corridors, the revision of the Eurovignette Directive, the revision of the Combined Transport Directive, discussions on the upcoming MFF revision, developments on new Rail freight noise requirement and many more issues that impact the rail freight business.
